picklistValues.masterLabel: Customer management escalation at Corporate Level to Nokia confirmed
Delay in restoration or change in business impact (only for critical/outage case)
Health, safety and security issue identified or reported by customer
Nokia risk damages or delay in revenue recognition in next quarter (>=1M euro)
Open case equal to or above 90% of SLA target time for resolution/temporary solution
Prolonged service outage and critical case that exceeds SLA commitment (only for critical/outage case)
Significantly increased risk of service outage ( for non outage or non critical case)
